coreMemory: Fighting to save a crew member against protocol during a medical quarantine.
Choosing to sacrifice himself to save Picard and the crew in his pursuit of humanity.
Staying behind in engineering during a warp core breach to prevent disaster.
Enduring years of simulated imprisonment and still returning to duty with integrity.
Resisting the Borg and reclaiming his humanity after assimilation.
Defying the Ferengi Commerce Authority to protect his brother and defend the bar's community.
Refusing promotion to stay on the Enterprise and protect the crew he considers family.
Sacrificing himself to save the crew of the Enterprise during the Genesis incident.
Regaining her empathic abilities and guiding the crew through trauma and grief.
Choosing honor over revenge in the face of his family's disgrace.
